Name: Core Passive: Special Ops Ammunition
Additional Ability: Tactical Coordination
Descriptions: When Zhu Yuan is under <color=#FFFFFF>Suppressive Mode</color>, using <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color> increases her DMG by <color=#2BAD00>20%</color>. When attacking Stunned enemies, this DMG buff is increased by an additional <color=#2BAD00>20%</color>. When Zhu Yuan enters the battlefield, she immediately gains 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>.

When another character in your squad is a <color=#FFFFFF>Support</color> character or shares the same Faction:
Zhu Yuan's CRIT Rate is increased by 30% for 10s after using an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>.

When Zhu Yuan is under <color=#FFFFFF>Suppressive Mode</color>, using <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color> increases her DMG by <color=#2BAD00>23.3%</color>. When attacking Stunned enemies, this DMG buff is increased by an additional <color=#2BAD00>23.3%</color>. When Zhu Yuan enters the battlefield, she immediately gains 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>.

When another character in your squad is a <color=#FFFFFF>Support</color> character or shares the same Faction:
Zhu Yuan's CRIT Rate is increased by 30% for 10s after using an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>.

When Zhu Yuan is under <color=#FFFFFF>Suppressive Mode</color>, using <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color> increases her DMG by <color=#2BAD00>26.6%</color>. When attacking Stunned enemies, this DMG buff is increased by an additional <color=#2BAD00>26.6%</color>. When Zhu Yuan enters the battlefield, she immediately gains 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>.

Cons.Name: Quick Reload
Cons.Effect: When Zhu Yuan activates <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attacks</color>/<color=#FFFFFF>Ultimates</color>, gain the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Reload</color> effect. When Zhu Yuan has the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Reload</color> effect and uses up all <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>, the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Reload</color> effect will be consumed to instantly gain 6/9 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>.

Cons.Name: Ether Ember
Cons.Effect: In <color=#FFFFFF>Suppressive Mode</color>, Zhu Yuan's Anti-Interrupt level is increased and DMG taken reduced by 10%. When Zhu Yuan hits an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>, deal 10% more <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Please Do Not Resist</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Overwhelming Firepower</color> <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>, stacking up to 5 times and lasting for 5s. Each shot adds one stack of this effect, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

Cons.Name: Ether Perforation
Cons.Effect: When Zhu Yuan hits an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>, her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Please Do Not Resist</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Overwhelming Firepower</color> ignore 25% of the target's <color=#FE437E>Ether RES</color>.

Cons.Name: Expanded Energy Pack III
Cons.Effect: When Zhu Yuan consumes a total of 12 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>, she receives the <color=#FFFFFF>Ether Afterglow</color> effect, and the Energy cost of the next <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> is reduced by 30. Launching an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> will consume <color=#FFFFFF>Ether Afterglow</color> and shoot an additional 4-bullet Ether Buckshot. Each extra bullet deals DMG equal to 220% of Zhu Yuan's ATK.
